column2: "Hmm- I was told to come here but... Oh, <%me>. Did you see her around here?"
"You know, her. Umm, what was her name again..."
"It's Aika."
"That's it, Aika, right. Yo, it's been a while, hasn't it?"
"Indeed. I would never have guessed to see you again within the ARKS Ship, Enga Yasaka."
"1. So, you were acquaintances?"
"2. What's your relationship?"
"I guess... It's been about one year since we first met, right?"
"It was during the time I began staying on Earth so... I guess it's around that period."
"I wouldn't say we have a relationship. Though it could mean the same thing."
"Don't say something so unexpected. There was a small margin of communication during my stay on Earth."
"Well, to spoil the answer, I told you before that Earthlings and ARKS had foregoing interactions with each other, right? It's just that."
"During my stay and missions on Earth, I've received numerous assistance from Earth Guide."
"One of those Earth Guide contactors was..."
"Basically, me. I just happened to live close by to the school Aika was infiltrating."
"The place Aika went to was called \"Seiga Academy\". It's the sister school to my place, \"Tensei\"."
"Many things happened during my time at Seiga Academy... I memorized everything I did there. They're my... precious memories."
"For us to reunite like this must be a foretelling sign. It's also reassuring to have an aquaintance around too."
"Once again, I look forward to working with you, Aika."
"Ah, likewise."
